package config

import (
	"os"
)

// Config is a struct that represents the configuration
type Config struct {
	fooBar string
}

// NewConfig creates a new Config instance
func NewConfig() *Config {
	c := &Config{}

	c.fooBar = os.Getenv("FOO_BAR")

	return c
}

// FooBar returns the FOO_BAR value
func (c *Config) FooBar() string {
	return c.fooBar
}
